entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 20.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 20. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
